FuncDef:
The eca-route-type compatible command sets the route type of the extended community attribute of OSPF VPN to 0x8000.
The undo eca-route-type compatible command restores the route type of the extended community attribute of OSPF VPN to 0x0306. The eca-route-type compatible command sets the route type of the extended community attribute of OSPF VPN to 0x8000. The undo eca-route-type compatible command restores the route type of the extended community attribute of OSPF VPN to 0x0306. By default, the route type of the extended community attribute of OSPF VPN is 0x0306.
ExtraInfo: The eca-route-type compatible command is used in OSPF VPN scenarios.
